category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 21-2 (Preparation and disclosure of safety management responsibility report)
contents: Article 21-2 (Preparation and disclosure of safety management responsibility report) ① The chairman of the board of directors shall prepare a safety management responsibility report by the end of January every year, taking into account the matters stipulated in the contents of the safety management responsibility report in Appendix 2. Revised December 16, 2022, ② The safety management responsibility report shall be prepared in consultation with the Minister of Health and Welfare and announced in accordance with Article 22 of the Safety Management Guidelines., [This Article Newly Inserted December 22, 2021]
